Hi,

You don't have to be religious or a follower of religion to enjoy THE LAST TEMPTATION OF CHRIST. A fantastic piece of cinema, and definitely one of Martin Scorsese's most underrated works, in my view.

I would also recommend the TV mini-series REVELATIONS, too, which you can see more about here. Although it's labelled as Season 1, it was only ever meant to be a 6-part mini-series. But it's enjoyably thrilling, with some intelligent plot points.
